abstract: Barosense has raised $27 million of a planned $30 million Series D round to help market a device that treats obesity without invasive surgery, PEHub reported.
snippet: Barosense has raised $27 million of a planned $30 million Series D round to help market a device that treats obesity without invasive surgery, PEHub reported.
lead_paragraph: Barosense has raised $27 million of a planned $30 million Series D round to help market a device that treats obesity without invasive surgery, PEHub reported.

headline.main: Barosense Adds $27 Million in Series D Round
